Difficult Terrain

Reduce Movement Speed by Half.

Difficult Terrain is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Difficult Terrain Information

Effect: Reduce Movement Speed by Half.

How to Acquire Difficult Terrain

Usually a spell or an environmental status effect. As most status effect usually refer to state affected by items bottle of Water or fire with Candles.

How to Remove Difficult Terrain

Usually get out of the environment or surface that has this status effect tends to work. Unlike other status effects like Acid or Frostbite which comes with DOT, this status effect is relatively simple to be removed.
